body_html:
Thanks for the contribution. Do you mind also updating the RunConfig pydoc for the log_step_count_steps? I think currently, it says:

 log_step_count_steps: The frequency, in number of global steps, that the
      global step/sec will be logged during training

which does not mention the effect this PR adds.
body_text:
Thanks for the contribution. Do you mind also updating the RunConfig pydoc for the log_step_count_steps? I think currently, it says:
 log_step_count_steps: The frequency, in number of global steps, that the
      global step/sec will be logged during training

which does not mention the effect this PR adds.
body:
Thanks for the contribution. Do you mind also updating the RunConfig pydoc for the log_step_count_steps? I think currently, it says:


     log_step_count_steps: The frequency, in number of global steps, that the
          global step/sec will be logged during training

 which does not mention the effect this PR adds.
